mapper.select: select t.tmpl_id,t.template_name from upp_template t where t.parent_template_id = #{nodeId} and t.template_type_code = '02' and t.status_code = '02'
select * from upp_template where tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id}
select t.tmpl_id, t.template_name, t.rela_metadata_names from upp_template t where t.prt_tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} and t.status_cd = '02'

select a.table_name from upp_table a left join upp_dic_fn_rela b on a.table_id=b.db_obj_id left join upp_tmpl_page c on c.page_element_id = b.metadata_id and c.is_curr_version='Y' where c.tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id}
select t.dim_sql_expr from upp_dim_source t where t.dim_cd = #{dimcode}
select t.* from upp_dim_source t where t.dim_cd = #{dimcode}

select e.column_name, CONCAT(' left join (' , c.dim_sql_expr , ') xd',e.rownum , ' on t.' , e.column_name , '=' , 'xd',e.rownum , '.' , c.code_col_name )as joinSql, CONCAT('xd',e.rownum , '.' , c.label_col_name ,' as ') as joinCondition
from upp_metadata a left join upp_page_field b on a.metadata_id = b.field_id inner join upp_dim_source c on c.dim_cd = b.dim_cd left join upp_dic_fn_rela d on d.metadata_id=b.field_id left join upp_column e on e.column_id = d.db_obj_id where a.status_cd = '02' and a.prt_metadata_id in (select c.metadata_id from upp_metadata c inner join upp_tmpl_page d on c.prt_metadata_id=d.page_element_id where d.tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} and c.md_cate_cd='FDL' and d.is_curr_version = 'Y')

select a.metadata_id, a.prt_metadata_id, a.metadata_name, a.status_cd, a.is_display, a.display_order, b.* from upp_metadata a left join upp_page_button b on a.metadata_id = b.button_id where a.status_cd = '02' and a.prt_metadata_id in (select c.metadata_id from upp_metadata c where c.prt_metadata_id = #{page_element_id} and c.md_cate_cd = 'TBA') order by a.display_order

select a.metadata_id,a.prt_metadata_id,a.metadata_name, a.status_cd,a.is_display,a.display_order,b.* ,c.code_col_name column_code,c.label_col_name column_label, g.column_id,g.column_name,g.data_type_cd from upp_metadata a left join upp_page_field b on a.metadata_id = b.field_id left join upp_dim_source c on c.dim_cd = b.dim_cd left join upp_metadata d on d.metadata_id=a.prt_metadata_id left join upp_dic_fn_rela f on f.metadata_id = a.metadata_id left join upp_column g on g.column_id=f.db_obj_id where d.prt_metadata_id = #{page_element_id} and d.md_cate_cd='FDL' and a.status_cd='02'
and b.component_type_id ='hidden'
and b.component_type_id !='hidden'
order by a.display_order

select a.metadata_id,a.prt_metadata_id,a.metadata_name, a.status_cd,a.is_display,a.display_order,b.* ,c.code_col_name column_code,c.label_col_name column_label, g.column_id,g.column_name,g.data_type_cd from upp_metadata a left join upp_page_field b on a.metadata_id = b.field_id left join upp_dim_source c on c.dim_cd = b.dim_cd left join upp_metadata d on d.metadata_id=a.prt_metadata_id left join upp_tmpl_page e on e.page_element_id=d.prt_metadata_id and e.is_curr_version='Y' left join upp_dic_fn_rela f on f.metadata_id = a.metadata_id left join upp_column g on g.column_id=f.db_obj_id where e.tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} and d.md_cate_cd='FDL' and a.status_cd='02'
and b.component_type_id ='hidden'
and b.component_type_id !='hidden'
order by a.display_order

select b.field_id||'_'||b.field_name as field_id, b.field_name, b.default_value, g.column_name, g.data_type_cd from upp_page_field b, upp_metadata a left join upp_dic_fn_rela f on f.metadata_id = a.metadata_id left join upp_column g on g.column_id=f.db_obj_id, upp_metadata d, upp_tmpl_page e where a.metadata_id = b.field_id and a.prt_metadata_id = d.metadata_id and d.prt_metadata_id = e.page_element_id and e.is_curr_version = 'Y' and e.tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} and d.md_cate_cd='FDL' and a.status_cd='02' and b.component_type_id ='hidden' and b.default_value is not null

select a.metadata_id,a.prt_metadata_id,a.metadata_name,a.status_cd,a.md_cate_cd, a.is_display,a.display_order from upp_metadata a where a.status_cd = '02' and a.md_cate_cd='FRM' and a.metadata_id in (select c.metadata_id from upp_metadata c where c.prt_metadata_id = #{page_element_id}) order by a.display_order

select a.metadata_id, a.prt_metadata_id, a.metadata_name, a.status_cd, a.is_display, a.display_order, b.* from upp_metadata a left join upp_page_button b on a.metadata_id = b.button_id where a.status_cd = '02' and a.prt_metadata_id = #{metadata_id} order by a.display_order

select 'parent' type, a.tmpl_id, a.prt_tmpl_id, a.template_name, a.template_type_cd, a.enter_type_cd, a.rela_metadata_names, d.table_id, d.table_name, d.table_data_source, b.page_element_id, a.display_order, e.flow_tmpl_id from upp_template a inner join upp_tmpl_page b on a.tmpl_id=b.tmpl_id and b.is_curr_version = 'Y' inner join upp_dic_fn_rela c on b.page_element_id = c.metadata_id inner join upp_table d on c.db_obj_id = d.table_id left join upp_tmpl_flow e on e.tmpl_id = a.tmpl_id where a.tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} union all select 'child' type, a.tmpl_id, a.prt_tmpl_id, a.template_name, a.template_type_cd, a.enter_type_cd, a.rela_metadata_names, d.table_id, d.table_name, d.table_data_source, b.page_element_id, a.display_order, e.flow_tmpl_id from upp_template a inner join upp_tmpl_page b on a.tmpl_id=b.tmpl_id and b.is_curr_version = 'Y' inner join upp_dic_fn_rela c on b.page_element_id = c.metadata_id inner join upp_table d on c.db_obj_id = d.table_id left join upp_tmpl_flow e on e.tmpl_id = a.tmpl_id where prt_tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} order by display_order
select * from upp_tmpl_flow t where t.tmpl_id = #{templateId}

select a.metadata_id, a.prt_metadata_id, a.metadata_name, a.status_cd, a.is_display, b.*, d.* from upp_metadata a left join upp_xls_column b on a.metadata_id = b.xls_col_id inner join upp_dic_fn_rela c on c.metadata_id = b.xls_col_id inner join upp_column d on d.column_id = c.db_obj_id where a.prt_metadata_id = #{sheet_id} order by b.display_order

select * from upp_xls_column a left join upp_metadata b on b.metadata_id=a.xls_col_id left join upp_xls_sheet d on d.sheet_id = b.prt_metadata_id left join upp_dic_fn_rela e on e.metadata_id=a.xls_col_id left join upp_column f on f.column_id=e.db_obj_id left join upp_metadata g on g.metadata_id=d.sheet_id where d.sheet_name = #{sheet_name} and g.prt_metadata_id = #{metadata_id} order by a.display_order
select * from upp_xls_sheet a left join upp_dic_fn_rela b on a.sheet_id=b.metadata_id left join upp_table c on b.db_obj_id = c.table_id where a.sheet_name = #{sheet_name}
select * from upp_tmpl_page a left join upp_dic_fn_rela b on a.page_element_id=b.metadata_id left join upp_table c on c.table_id = b.db_obj_id where a.tmpl_id = #{tmpl_id} and a.is_curr_version='Y'

select a.field_id,a.field_name,c.column_id,c.column_name from upp_page_field a inner join upp_dic_fn_rela b on a.field_id=b.metadata_id inner join upp_column c on c.column_id = b.db_obj_id inner join upp_metadata d on d.metadata_id = a.field_id inner join upp_metadata e on e.metadata_id = d.prt_metadata_id inner join upp_tmpl_page f on f.page_element_id = e.prt_metadata_id and f.is_curr_version='Y' inner join upp_metadata g on g.metadata_id =c.column_id inner join upp_dic_fn_rela i on i.metadata_id=e.prt_metadata_id and i.db_obj_id=g.prt_metadata_id where lower(c.column_name)=#{rela_name} and tmpl_id=#{tmpl_id}

select a.field_id,a.field_name,c.column_id,c.column_name from upp_page_field a inner join upp_dic_fn_rela b on a.field_id=b.metadata_id inner join upp_column c on c.column_id = b.db_obj_id inner join upp_metadata d on d.metadata_id = a.field_id inner join upp_metadata e on e.metadata_id = d.prt_metadata_id inner join upp_tmpl_page f on f.page_element_id = e.prt_metadata_id and f.is_curr_version='Y' inner join upp_metadata g on g.metadata_id =c.column_id inner join upp_dic_fn_rela i on i.metadata_id=e.prt_metadata_id and i.db_obj_id=g.prt_metadata_id where lower(c.column_name)=#{rela_name} and tmpl_id=#{prt_tmpl_id}
mapper.sql: select f.field_id as metadata_id, f.field_name as metadata_name, f.default_value from upp_page_field f, upp_metadata a, upp_metadata u, upp_tmpl_page d where f.field_id = a.metadata_id and f.component_type_id != 'hidden' and a.prt_metadata_id = u.metadata_id and u.prt_metadata_id = d.page_element_id and u.md_cate_cd = 'FDL' and d.tmpl_id = #{templateId} and d.is_curr_version = 'Y' order by f.display_order
mapper.select: select f.field_id as metadata_id, f.field_name as metadata_name, f.default_value from upp_page_field f, upp_metadata a, upp_metadata u, upp_tmpl_page d where f.field_id = a.metadata_id and f.component_type_id = 'hidden' and f.DEFAULT_VALUE is not null and a.prt_metadata_id = u.metadata_id and u.prt_metadata_id = d.page_element_id and u.md_cate_cd = 'FDL' and d.tmpl_id = #{templateId} and d.is_curr_version = 'Y' order by f.display_order asc
select t.* from ${tableName} t where business_no in ('${businessNos}')
mapper.update: update ${tableName} t set t.flow_status_code = #{status} where t.business_no in ('${businessNos}')
mapper.select: select component_type_id from upp_page_field where field_id = #{metadata_id}
select count(1) as cnt from upp_tmpl_flow where tmpl_id=#{tmpId}
